name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi超生誕祭2021 ゲスト：角巻わため／桃鈴ねね [RyrHynHHbmY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Nene Momosuzu performs her song 'Saikyou nene-chi'.
MC segment featuring Nene Momosuzu and AZKi, with Watame Tsunomaki watching.
Nene Momosuzu and AZKi perform the song 'Neko naraba ikeru'.

subtitles.original: ただいまー！
subtitles.english: I'm home!

subtitles.original: 最後にねねねねねねねねねねねねねねねね
subtitles.english: Lastly, Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene

subtitles.original: ねね！ねね！
subtitles.english: Nene! Nene!

subtitles.original: ねねねねねねねね
subtitles.english: Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene

subtitles.original: ねね！ねね！
subtitles.english: Nene! Nene!

subtitles.original: ねねねねねねねね
subtitles.english: Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene-Nene

subtitles.original: ねね！ねね！
subtitles.english: Nene! Nene!

subtitles.original: 全力全開で今全力全開でいこう
subtitles.english: Let's go full throttle now, going full throttle

subtitles.original: 思いっきりやればなんとかなるよ
subtitles.english: If you give it your all, it'll work out somehow

subtitles.original: ヨイショ！
subtitles.english: Heave-ho!

subtitles.original: ヨイショ！
subtitles.english: Heave-ho!

subtitles.original: ただ駆け抜けていこうよね
subtitles.english: Let's just keep running through

subtitles.original: ね！ね！ね！ね！
subtitles.english: Ne! Ne! Ne! Ne!

subtitles.original: ね！ね！ね！
subtitles.english: Ne! Ne! Ne!

subtitles.original: 大爆走！
subtitles.english: Grand stampede!

subtitles.original: それじゃまたねね～
subtitles.english: Well then, see you later, Nene~

subtitles.original: またねね～
subtitles.english: See you later, Nene~

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: ブラボー！
subtitles.english: Bravo!

subtitles.original: 最高ー！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: えー、はい、というわけで
subtitles.english: Uh, yes, and so...

subtitles.original: さてさて
subtitles.english: Well now...

subtitles.original: ここでね、みんな、今日はあずあず先輩のお誕生日会だから
subtitles.english: So everyone, since today is Azu-Azu-senpai's birthday party,

subtitles.original: ここであずあず先輩と一緒に歌っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to sing together with Azu-Azu-senpai here!

subtitles.original: あずあず先輩！
subtitles.english: Azu-Azu-senpai!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとちびあず事故が...
subtitles.english: Eh, a little Chibi-Azu accident...

subtitles.original: ちびあず事故が起きちゃったんですけど
subtitles.english: A Chibi-Azu accident occurred, but...

subtitles.original: そこもねねちのアイドル力でカバーしてもらって
subtitles.english: Nene-chi's idol power covered for that,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ聞きたかったあの2曲を今日歌ってもらえてもう...
subtitles.english: I've been wanting to hear those two songs so much, and hearing them today...

subtitles.original: 幸せ、幸せ、幸せです、あずきはもう
subtitles.english: I'm happy, happy, so happy. AZKi is just...

subtitles.original: 今日もう胸がいっぱいで...
subtitles.english: I'm so full of emotion today...

subtitles.original: まだまだいっぱいあるから、これから！
subtitles.english: There's still plenty more to come from here!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで
subtitles.english: Yes, so...

subtitles.original: なんと今日はねねちと一緒に...
subtitles.english: Today, I'll be together with Nene-chi...

subtitles.original: 歌います！
subtitles.english: Singing!

subtitles.original: 歌ってみたかったんだー！
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to sing this!

subtitles.original: ねねちと何を歌おうかなと思って、今日あずきこの曲を選曲してきました
subtitles.english: I was wondering what to sing with Nene-chi, so I chose this song today.

subtitles.original: すごい良い曲です
subtitles.english: It's a really great song.

subtitles.original: で、これはあのね、めちゃくちゃねねちに合うと思って
subtitles.english: And, you know, I thought this would suit Nene-chi perfectly.

subtitles.original: ねねちって言ったら元気いっぱい、ワー！という感じで
subtitles.english: When you think of Nene-chi, it's all energy and 'Wah!'

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒に盛り上がれる曲になっておりますので
subtitles.english: This is a song that everyone can get excited to,

subtitles.original: みなさん、猫になる準備はよろしいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Everyone, are you ready to become cats?

subtitles.original: よろしいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 猫になる準備をよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please get ready to become cats!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで二人でこの曲を歌いたいと思います
subtitles.english: Yes, so the two of us would like to sing this song.

subtitles.original: では一緒に行きましょう、せーの！
subtitles.english: Then, let's go together. Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 猫ならばいける！！
subtitles.english: If you're a cat, you can do it!!

subtitles.original: 猫になって甘やかされたい
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be pampered

subtitles.original: 猫になって愛されたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be loved

subtitles.original: 猫になってお昼寝させて
subtitles.english: Let me become a cat and take a nap

subtitles.original: 起きたら100万登録いってないかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll have a million subs when I wake up

subtitles.original: 猫ならばいける
subtitles.english: If you're a cat, you can do it

subtitles.original: ニャ！ニャ！
subtitles.english: Meow! Meow!

subtitles.original: レスしたけどちゃんとおはツイしなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I replied, but I have to do my morning tweet properly

subtitles.original: 下書きのまま三時間経って
subtitles.english: Three hours have passed with it still in drafts

subtitles.original: 完璧な140字 推敲ミスってデリート
subtitles.english: The perfect 140 chars, a typo in the draft and I delete it

subtitles.original: 心が折れる日曜日
subtitles.english: A heart-breaking Sunday

subtitles.original: 休みもなしで歌い続ける そんなのへっちゃら余裕だぜ
subtitles.english: Singing without any breaks, that's easy-peasy

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒なら大丈夫
subtitles.english: If I'm with everyone, it'll be okay

subtitles.original: だから応援よろしくね 本質的に甘やかして
subtitles.english: So please support me, pamper me to the core

subtitles.original: マイセルフでね！
subtitles.english: By myself, right!

subtitles.original: でも今日はヤバイ (はいはい)
subtitles.english: But today is crazy (yes yes)

subtitles.original: 相当にエモい (はいはい)
subtitles.english: Extremely emotional (yes yes)

subtitles.original: んな私もちゃんと見てほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to see me like that too

subtitles.original: 純情な愛がほしい
subtitles.english: I want pure love

subtitles.original: だから猫になって甘やかされたい
subtitles.english: So I want to become a cat and be pampered

subtitles.original: 猫になって愛されたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be loved

subtitles.original: 猫になってお昼寝させて
subtitles.english: Let me become a cat and take a nap

subtitles.original: 起きたら100万登録だにゃ
subtitles.english: It'll be a million subscribers when I wake up, nya

subtitles.original: 猫になって輝きたいの
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and shine

subtitles.original: 猫になって開拓するよ
subtitles.english: I'll blaze a trail as a cat

subtitles.original: もっと君に伝わりますように
subtitles.english: I hope this reaches you even more

subtitles.original: 猫ならばいける

subtitles.original: ニャ！ニャ！
subtitles.english: Meow! Meow!

subtitles.original: アピールしちゃって公演で 可愛いワンちゃん見つけたよ

subtitles.original: 撫でようとしたら吠えられた
subtitles.english: I tried to pet it but it barked at me

subtitles.original: やっぱ猫になりたい
subtitles.english: I really want to be a cat

subtitles.original: 隠しきれない本音知ってほしい

subtitles.english: Become a cat and laugh together

subtitles.original: もっとみんな猫になろうよ
